## Saldae Analytics 
We are an innovative and value driven start up preaching for Advanced Analytics solutions and consists of a  **web based platform** enabling a handy and insightful data exploration, analysis and fully automatized forecasting tool for  price, demand, production, sales prediction...<br>
Our product is mainly designed for companies heading in the direction of data-driven business transformation.<br>

For more details, please feel free to visit our website and get in touch with us : <br>

<p style="color:green;">https://www.saldaeanalytics.com/</p>
